sentences.en: " Caught " is an irregular past tense form.
"Will you do this for me, Leo? It's the only way."— 'It's highly irregular. Ralph.'
sentences.cn: “利奥，你能为我做这件事吗？这是唯一的办法了。”——“拉尔夫，这么做是很不正当的。”
锯齿状不规则的海岸线

sentences.en: a verb with an irregular conjugation
At least 17 different irregular units are engaged in the war.
sentences.cn: 至少有17个非正规军部队参战。
断断续续地有汽车驶过。

sentences.en: He visits us at irregular intervals.
sentences.cn: 他不定期地来探访我们.

sentences.en: Irregular forms are given in parentheses .
sentences.cn: 不规则形式标注在括号内。

sentences.en: It has a highly irregular shape, covered in bumps and indentations.
sentences.cn: 它的外形极不规则，满是凸起和凹陷的地方。

sentences.en: She had an undulating , but oftentimes a sharp and irregular movement.
sentences.cn: 她行踪飘忽, 时常会作出突然而意外的动作.

sentences.en: She touched its tough irregular surface.
sentences.cn: 她碰到了它那粗糙不平的表面.

sentences.en: She was taken to hospital suffering from an irregular heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 她因心律不齐被送往医院。

sentences.en: Smoking could lead to irregular heartbeats.
The course of this river used to be quite irregular.
sentences.cn: 这条河流的水道原来很不规则.

sentences.en: The paint was drying in irregular patches.
sentences.cn: 油漆一片片地慢慢变干了。

trans.tran_cn: 不规则的，不对称的，无规律的，不合规范的，不合法的，不规则变化的
trans.tran_en: having a shape, surface, pattern etc that is not even, smooth, or balanced

trans.tran_cn: 非正规军军人，不规则物，不合规格的产品
